page.title: 16Doctor Billington, Eccleston
page.content: One of the village doctors occupies a surgery opposite Eccleston County Primary School.He is the only doctor in this practice,and has been there for 10 years. Over 3000 patients are on his panel,and he sees about 50% of them each year.Every week about 10 people are referred to hospital.The doctor does not visit as many patients in their homes as he used to do because more have cars and can visit the surgery.About 50 visit him each day.A consultation takes an average 6 minutes.The percentage of older patients is increasing. The doctor reports that people are more health- conscious than they used to be.They know more about illnesses, treatments and how to live healthy lives.
